select a.OBJECTID, a.TYPEFLAG, a.guid as ID, a.ORDERID, a.TABLEID, a.ISRESERVE, a.ISMAINTABLE, a.ISREADONLY, a.PROCESSID, a.ISOPENED from (select a1.*,'0' flag from spf_t_setprojtab a1 where a1.OBJECTID = #{objectid} and a1.TYPEFLAG = #{typeflag} and a1.PROCESSID= #{processId} union all select a2.*,'1' flag from spf_t_setprojtab a2 where a2.TYPEFLAG = #{typeflag} and a2.PROCESSID = #{processId} and a2.OBJECTID = (select b.projtypeid from spf_t_fbaseinfo b where b.spfid = #{objectid})
and a2.ISRESERVE=1
and a2.TABLEID not in (select c.TABLEID from spf_t_setprojtab c where c.OBJECTID = #{objectid} and c.TYPEFLAG = #{typeflag} and c.PROCESSID=#{processId})) a,dict_t_model m where a.TABLEID=m.TABLEID order by a.ORDERID
select count(*) from spf_t_setprojtab a, dict_t_model b where a.TABLEID=b.TABLEID and a.OBJECTID=#{objectid} and a.TYPEFLAG=#{typeflag} and a.PROCESSID=#{processId}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT T.RECID, T.CTRLID, DECODE(T.CTRLNAME, '', D.NAME, T.CTRLNAME) CTRLNAME, T.SUPERID, T.ISLEAF, T.LEVELNO, T.ORDERID, T.ISTEXT, T.COLSPAN, T.ROWSPAN, T.ISGROUPCTRL, T.ISSHOW FROM DICT_T_SETRECDETAIL T, DICT_T_FACTOR D WHERE RECID = #{recid} AND T.CTRLID = D.COLUMNID(+)) A WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DICT_T_FACTOR FACTR WHERE A.CTRLID = FACTR.COLUMNID) OR A.ISGROUPCTRL = '1' ORDER BY ORDERID
select a.PROJTYPEID from spf_t_fbaseinfo a where a.SPFID=#{objectid}
